name: Description
info:
1. ### Receive websocket msg from ESP.
 2. ### Filter the data:
    - BME Readings
    - BME health 
    - ESP feedback --> Console
 3. ### Process and distribute message
    - assign topic and scale BME readings
    - send ESP Feedback to Console block
 4. ### Display received message
    - BME current - gauge
    - BME historic - chart
 5. ### User input: BME interval
 6. ### User input: Trigger BME reading

name: Description
info:
1. ### Process user inputs
    -  Thermostat deadband -> create context variable
    -  Thermostat control -> evaluate heater required
    -  GPIO controls -> "0" / "1"
    -  Reboot ESP / Reset Wifi credentials / OTA upgrade commands
    -  BME trigger new reading
2. ### Clean message (keep topic & payload only)
3. ### Send message to ESP via websocket
4. ### Show IP addresses
    - Get IP address from ESP (ws client)
    - Node-red IP address (ws server)

name: Heater
Filter
Get GPIO Fdback
Boiler state
Heater state
LED state
Debug state

rules.to:
'
✅ Wifi Cleared. Reboot ESP for changes to take effect. Connect to ssid: "ESP WIFI MANAGER", url: 192.168.4.1 and set new credentials
'

name: Get BME Readings
Description
info:
1. ### Process feedback from ESP:
    - GPIO # and state
    - BME Interval
    - Debug
    - ESP IP
    - Host IP
    - BME Health

name: Clean object
Get Local IP
